template.name: Helpdesk - How to Submit and Track Tickets

div.h3: How to submit and track a support ticket

div.p: Follow these steps to create a ticket, provide details, and follow up until it's resolved.

ol.li: Prepare your details: Collect a clear subject, description of the issue, any screenshots or attachments, and your contact details (`Ticket Email` / `Ticket Phone`).
Create a ticket: Click Create New Ticket on the Tickets page or use the portal form. Choose the relevant Category and optionally the Type.

Email submissions: If you send the ticket via email, the system decodes the inbound message and displays it in the Email tab (read-only). The message is cleaned of special formatting for better readability.
What happens next: Agents will review and assign the ticket. If a ticket is moved to a Rejected stage, it is automatically reassigned to the team owner for review.

Follow up & resolution: Use the Messages area on the ticket to reply; you will receive updates in the portal. For escalation, request supervisor review in your reply or via the provided contact details.

ul.li: Attach files (screenshots, logs) to help engineers reproduce the issue faster.
Use `Ticket Email` and `Ticket Phone` so agents can contact you directly if needed.
Check the ticket Status on the Tickets page for progress updates.
